imgDesc.text:
These drums were created by the Order of Skeptics' ancestors. Hit them according to a specific method to cause the elemental power within to resound...
There are three ways of hitting these drums. <color=#ffe14b>Normal Attacks</color> will create a light sound, while <color=#ffe14b>Plunging Attacks</color> will create a heavy one. <color=#ffe14b>Stay still</color> to create a pause.

There are often drum scores near Kory Drums. The scores are comprised of various leaves that are split into three categories: <color=#ffe14b>empty, half, and full</color> , which correspond to <color=#ffe14b>pause, light, and heavy</color> beats.
Read the scores from left to right and top to bottom.
After your performance begins, each glimmer of a Kory Drum represents one beat. Follow the score and the beat to create the corresponding drumbeat and complete your performance!
